creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: ink drawing of skinny elderly man in straw hat running toward L, carrying a long pole that he aims at a dangling object in a tree at UL; inscription at R
inscription:
Inscription and Seals

R side: (Don\'t be a fool. / It\'s not a bird. It\'s only a straw sandal / that is looking for a wearer)
markings: Seals R edge and top C: (Hakuin) ; (Ekaku no in)
title: Bird Catcher
